thread.section_title: Hiberia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: City break
thread.title_full: City break - Review of Hiberia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: wendy j
title: City break
text:
Just returned home from first city break with hubby. Hotel Hiberia is excellent, we will definitely return. Had a Fab Four nights here,the staff were great the room we had was plenty big enough and spotless and the buffet breakfast was plenty big enough to start you off for a full day of sightseeing. Excellent front of house team aswell and the young lad serving at the bar in the evening was a pleasure to speak to.
Room Tip: Room 101 is a low floor but you can hear the traffic. See more room tips
